title: am i able to get alister for free?

replies.body:
Sure thing!  You can grab [Unchained Alistar](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc) by following Riot games on Youtube.  If you run into any issues, feel free to contact us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to help individually with your request!  

I want my skin blitzbot
